section.title: Introduction
section.para: This chapter is a quick installation checklist.
SCIRun is officially compatible with two platforms: SGI and Linux.
See for minimum system requirements and detailed installation instructions.
See for required thirdparty software and instructions on its installation.

listitem.para: Obtain the source trees for SCIRun and any desired packages.
Unzip the SCIRun source tree into a directory of your choosing.
The chosen directory will be referred to as install dir from now on.
Unzip the packages (if any) into install dir/SCIRun/src/Packages.
Ensure that the target install machine matches the above system requirements.
Run configure from a directory of your choosing.
The chosen directory will be referred to as build dir from now on.
Run GNU make in the build dir directory.
